projects.title: Event Management for college clubs - SigmaEvents
projects.description: Developed an event management platform using Next.js and MongoDB allowing users to easily plan events and manage profile.
achievements: This project is also selected in SWOC Season 4.

features.featureDescription: Allows users to switch between light and dark mode as per their comfort.
Stores user's personal information in MongoDB so you don't need to fill same details for every event registration.
Allows users to register and manage for events easily and seamlessly.

projects.title: News Aggregator Platform - NewsHunter
projects.description: Created news aggregator platform fetching live articles from NewsAPI based on user's interests.

features.featureDescription: Provides news articles based on user's interests, dynamic content.
Implemented dynamic handling of API calls based on user-provided keywords using the slug concept.

projects.title: Simple Quiz Website
projects.description: Built a simple quiz website in Next.js using MongoDB for database and deployed it on Netlify.

features.featureDescription: Created a simple quiz website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript in Next.js for educational purposes.
10 hard-coded questions with a 15-second timer for each question, with results saved in a MongoDB database.

responsibilities: Created and maintained APIs using Node.js and Express.js.
Used Firebase's Firestore as the database and implemented CRUD operations.

experiences.company: Google Developer Student Club, NIE Mysore
responsibilities: Designed and developed user interfaces for web applications using Next.js and Tailwind CSS.

achievements.title: Google Developer Student Club, NIE Mysore
description: Tech Core Member of the GDSC Club.
